mapper.select: select count(1) from user where email=#{email};
mapper.update: update user set captcha=#{num} where email=#{email};
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where captcha=#{captcha} and email=#{email};

mapper.select: select id,email from user where email=#{email} and password=#{password};
